channel.title: Change on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Change on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: I Made Something Happen
item.description: I think Seth Godin might have been onto something with “Make something happen”, so I did. Today was my last day at EVRY. Some might already have been aware of this, mostly because of Hoff-Job-Announcement-as-a-Service, but also because of my own tweet as I left the EVRY offices in Bergen as an employee for the last time: https://twitter.com/h0bbel/status/715526670254473217 The decision to leave EVRY was not an easy one,Â but it was time to try something else.

item.title: My Personal vMotion
item.description: Every once in a while an opportunity presents itself that is just too good to pass up and after 8 years at Seatrans AS I’ve decided to move on and and accept a position as a Senior Consultant in the Infrastructure Consulting division of EDB ErgoGroup. Seatrans has been a fantastic employer, and without the backing and support I’ve had over the years I would not be in a position where this change would be possible.
